name: Swift Boots
description: A pair of lightweight boots that enhance the wearer's movement speed.
looks: The boots are made of fine leather and have intricate stitching. They have a sleek and streamlined design.

name: Elven Bow
description: A beautifully crafted bow made by skilled elven artisans.
looks: The bow is made from white wood with intricate engravings of elven symbols. It is light and flexible, perfect for long-range attacks.

special_weapon_skills.archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

special_effects.earthen_shot: Has a chance to immobilize the target for a short duration.

name: Radiant Dagger
description: A shining dagger that glows with an ethereal light.
looks: The dagger has a silver blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is adorned with a brilliant gemstone.

special_effects.radiant_strike: Has a 15% chance to deal additional radiant damage

name: Fire Mage Robe
description: A robe designed for fire mages, providing bonus to fire damage.
looks: The robe is made of red silk with golden embroideries depicting flames.

special_effects.fire_affinity: Increases damage of fire spells by 10%

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A magical cloak that grants the user invisibility.
looks: The cloak is made of a shimmering fabric that seems to blend with the surroundings.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants the user invisibility for a limited duration.

name: Invisibility Potion
description: A potion that grants temporary invisibility to the user.
looks: The potion is a translucent liquid in a clear glass bottle.

name: Superior Healing Potion
description: A potion that restores a significant amount of health.
looks: A large glass vial filled with a bright blue liquid.

name: Strength Potion
description: A potion that temporarily boosts the drinker's strength and melee damage.
looks: The potion is a vibrant red color, swirling with energy.

name: Mana Elixir
description: A powerful elixir that instantly restores a large amount of mana.
looks: A crystal-clear vial containing a sparkling blue liquid.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that allows the user to cast a powerful fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of ancient parchment and is sealed with a wax seal depicting a flame.

special_effects.Explosive: Causes a small explosion upon impact, damaging all nearby enemies.
